Use smart locks: Smart locks can be programmed to unlock only when the owner is present, and can be controlled remotely through a smartphone app.
Use a combination lock: A combination lock can be used to secure belongings, and the combination can be changed regularly to prevent unauthorized access.
Use a safe: A safe can be used to store important documents and valuables, and can be secured with a combination lock or biometric authentication.
Use a security camera: A security camera can be used to monitor the area and alert the owner if any unauthorized access is detected.
Use a tracking device: A tracking device can be attached to belongings to track their location and alert the owner if they are lost or stolen.
